remarks: An element covering a lattice line is a lattice plane and vice-versa. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jun-2012.)
statement:
llncvrlpln.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
llncvrlpln.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
llncvrlpln.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
llncvrlpln.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
llncvrlpln $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ X C Y ) -> ( X e. N <-> Y e. P ) ) $.
